Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Klay Thompson?

Klay Thompson is 35 years old.

Where was Klay Thompson born?

Klay Thompson was born in Los Angeles, California.

When was Klay Thompson born?

Klay Thompson was born on February 8, 1990.

How tall is Klay Thompson?

Klay Thompson is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much does Klay Thompson weigh?

Klay Thompson weighs 215 lbs (97 kg).

Is Klay Thompson in the Hall of Fame?

Klay Thompson is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Klay Thompson drafted?

Klay Thompson was drafted by Golden State Warriors, 1st round (11th pick, 11th overall), 2011 NBA Draft.

What position does Klay Thompson play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

What is Klay Thompson's net worth?

Klay Thompson has made at least $284,561,386 playing professional basketball.

How much does Klay Thompson make?

Klay Thompson made $43,219,440 in 2024.

What does Klay Thompson average?

Klay Thompson averages 9.7 points, 2.5 rebounds, and 1.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Klay Thompson have?

Klay Thompson has won 4 championships.

What is Klay Thompson's Instagram account?

Klay Thompson is on Instagram at klaythompson.

What schools did Klay Thompson attend?

Klay Thompson attended Santa Margarita in Rancho Santa Margarita, California and Washington State.

What are Klay Thompson's nicknames?

Big Smokey, Killa Klay, Game 6 Klay, The Electrician, Sea Captain are nicknames for Klay Thompson.
